page.title: 11Activities by Alexander Gdns
page.content: On the{beach by Alexander Gardens,}the {donkeys}are one of the main attractions.They are owned by the Downtons and are the cheapest in England.The{trampolines}are good fun. It is 20p.for a go lasting about 10mins.The{swingboats}cost 40p.During the peak season each go is about 7mins .Near the swingboats are a few round- abouts for little children.Every year {Mr.F.Darrington}comes to{Weymouth {Beach}and makes{sand models.}The models are of all different things from a{banana to a chimpanzee.}They are all very lifelike. { Alexander Gardens}are just over the road from the beach.There is a{large {amusement aracade with a casino area. There are machines like Pacman and Mr. Do.Outside are{train and rocket {roundabouts}for small children. -Neil Appleby,Steven Stovell.
